ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would definitely recommend this course to other students as it will cover many topics related not just to accounting but also finance. Rick also provided his thought process about papers he wrote personally which was excellent in understanding the research development process.
Yes, help you understand accounting research
I would recommend this class to students looking to learn more about the field of accounting research

I would recommend this course to other students, even those outside of accounting. For accounting students, this class helps provide us with an understanding of theoretical discussions of important topics in our field, such as conservatism. For other students, it provides good exposure to game theory in research. The class can also be rather fun.
Would recommend to upper year PhD students in accounting and finance.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It greatly increased my knowledge of accounting theory research which will be critical in my development as a future researcher. As a future researcher, I will need to be informed about all the various forms of research in my field. The papers covered during the semester covered a lot of topics in theory research which I believe was a great first step in developing my understanding.
This provided a very good expansion in the breadth of my knowledge of the field
I broadens my horizon regarding some of the corporate finance issues.
